content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the behavior of lines 2 and 3 in the code segment?

choices.label: Line 2 doubles the first element in the array and line 3 adds 10 to the second element.
Line 2 doubles the second element in the array and line 3 adds 10 to the third element.
Line 2 doubles the third element in the array and line 3 adds 10 to the fourth element.
Lines 2 and 3 do not change the contents of the array.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
